assignments.description: Sum of Ownership Percentages (The two other assignments are for a workaround to correctly populate the State Name in the Datatable)
assignments.name: Compute_TotalOwnership
assignments.label: Compute TotalOwnership

assignments.description: Sets Business Owner Address fields to be same as that of Business Address
assignments.name: Set_Address_Values
assignments.label: Set Business Address Values

assignments.description: Add Edited record from the loop to the Collection Variable
assignments.name: Set_Edited_Fields
assignments.label: Set Edited Fields

assignments.description: Set Business Id on Business Owner Record to be created.
assignments.name: Set_ID_on_Business_Owner
assignments.label: Set ID on Business Owner

assignments.description: Set Business Ownership Percentage field value and compute Cumulative Ownership.
assignments.name: Set_Percentage_Ownership_Values
assignments.label: Set Percentage Ownership Values

assignments.description: Set Address Variables to Business Address values incase the new Business Contact chooses "Address Same as Business Address"
assignments.name: SetAddressVariables
assignments.label: SetAddressVariables

decisions.description: Check if the all owner details are accounted for (100% cumulative ownership is achieved)
decisions.name: Another_Business_Contact
decisions.label: Another Business Contact?

decisions.description: Checks if Business Contact address is selected "Same as Business address".
decisions.name: Contact_Address_same_as_Business_Address
decisions.label: Contact Address same as Business Address?

decisions.description: Checks to see if full ownership is accounted for.
decisions.name: Contact_Details_Complete
decisions.label: Contact Details Complete?

decisions.description: No change if 100% Ownership is accounted for AND User validates the present information is correct.
decisions.name: Contact_Information_Change
decisions.label: Contact Information Change

decisions.description: Null check for Get Existing Business Contact Records
decisions.name: Owner_Records_Exist
decisions.label: Owner Records Exist?

Flow.description: Flow to create a Business Owner record for entity formation fulfillments

formulas.description: Converts 10 digit phone number to (123) 123-1234 format
formulas.name: SFphoneNumberStandard

Flow.label: Opportunity - Entity Formation - Business Owner

loops.description: Loops over each existing Business Contact Record and prompts to edit
loops.name: Edit_Business_Contact_Information
loops.label: Edit Business Contact Information

loops.description: Loop through records and check total ownership.
loops.name: Loop_Through_Owner_Records
loops.label: Loop Through Owner Records

recordLookups.description: Get Business Record where Record Id is same as the Business Id passed from the main Flow
recordLookups.name: Get_Business_Record

recordLookups.description: Get Business Owner Records related to the existing Business.
recordLookups.name: Get_Existing_Business_Contact_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Existing Business Contact Records
